posts.post_title: Wanted - N172 Old Judge - beaters, skinned/trimmed OK!
posts.post_content:
I'm looking for just about any Old Judge beaters...

skinned and trimmed is fine, as long as it has a beater price!

Got one through this thread... thanks Sean!

Anyone else?
Still looking for some low cost beaters! I don't care how bad they are!
my monthly bump... still looking for some of the worst OJs out there!
